comment: He's really good. He knows what he's talking about. There are pop quizzes every other class but as long as you're paying attention you'll be fine. There are exit tickets that are not hard. The material is easy and different than what we learn in elem. so be flexible about learning new methods . Tests are a bit hard so study. Take him if you can!

I actually really enjoyed this class. He is helpful and ALWAYS wants his students to understand the material. There are pop quizzes before most classes, but they are super easy if you've been paying attention and he literally goes over what the quiz is on before you take it. 3 tests and a final, which is cumulative. Easy class.
He literally is terrible, I think I am more confused from taking him. Wouldn't recommend him for people who struggle with math!
Homework is not mandatory. Quizzes at the beginning of almost every class. Posts pictures of what was discussed in class on vista. He makes you think.

I loved him. extremely helpful. quizzes everyday. homework is not useless it is helpful. He is funny and really cares about his students. He takes pictures and posts them on vista every day of what he puts on the white board..very helpful to study.

I have taken him for 3316 and 3317 and I would never take him again! I have studied so much and have a d in the class right now. doesnt use the book. quizzes every class period. he is not helpful at all. makes students feel stupid. I would take another teacher.

GREAT teacher and a fun easy class. He gives little quizzes about every other class, but they are easy and actually help you make a better grade on tests. He makes sure you understand everything. I am taking him again for MATH 3317. TAKE HIM!!

I loved this class! No BUSY WORK, NO USELESS GROUP PROJECTS, AND NO USELESS HOMEWORK!! You need to be motivated to study any material you do not understand yourself. Sometimes I feel like the EDUC teachers at KSU are trying to teach us  as if we were CHILDREN!He is NOT one of them:)He is a math genius, but humble and will never make you feel stupid

Excellent teacher! He gives you a lot of hands-on manipulatives to work with, and they are very cost effective materials you can use in the field.  He gives lots of quizzes and a few writing assignments. If you don't come to class, he posts the notes on GA View. Very easy class!

I learned a lot without every memorizing a formula. He teaches based on exploration and class activities. If you attend class and take notes and do well on the quizzes, you'll do great in the class.  He uses various supplemental reading material which I recommend, as many quiz questions and test questions came right from the supplemental material.

He is a great professor.  He gives at least ten quizzes throughout the semester.  But he reviews the subject material right before the quiz.  He also gives 8 writing assignments which are pass/fail.  All you have to do is write 2 pages and show an interest and you are set.  The quizzes are a very good review for the exams.
He gives quizes at least once a week, sometimes twice. They are helpful though. He is a pretty good teacher.

If you want a solid foundation in teaching math in early childhood education, this professor is for you. He offers a "life-time guarantee" and will help you, answer questions even after taking the class. His commitment to his students is awesome!!!!!!
He is a great teacher. As long as you show up for class and follow along you should do wonderful!! His assignments are easy and he grades very fair. Lots of quizzes!
